tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pollution_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    pollution_level FLOAT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE pollution_sources (
    source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    source_name VARCHAR(255),
    source_type VARCHAR(50),
    location_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES air_quality_data(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE pollution_readings (
    reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    reading_value FLOAT,
    reading_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES air_quality_data(location_id)
);
